text: Gaming monitors are usually known to be expensive. This is because they come with features that gamers can appreciate, like higher refresh rates, lower response times, better color reproduction, and so on. But if you’re looking for a cheaper gaming display, you don’t want to miss this monitor deal for the Samsung Odyssey G85SB. Buy On Amazon The Samsung Odyssey G85SB gaming monitor is currently on sale on Amazon. Thanks to a limited time deal, the monitor is enjoying a 49% discount, slashing its price down from $1,200 to $617. This is an absolute steal considering what you’ll be getting in the process! The monitor features a 34-inch curved display. It boasts a 175Hz refresh rate, support for AMD FreeSync Premium, a response time of 0.03ms, and offers DisplayHDR True Black 400 support. It’s a pretty fantastic gaming monitor, and at this price we doubt you’ll find anything better, so click here to go to Amazon and claim this deal today! html:
Gaming monitors are usually known to be expensive. This is because they come with features that gamers can appreciate, like higher refresh rates, lower response times, better color reproduction, and so on. But if you’re looking for a cheaper gaming display, you don’t want to miss this monitor deal for the Samsung Odyssey G85SB.

Buy On Amazon

The Samsung Odyssey G85SB gaming monitor is currently on sale on Amazon. Thanks to a limited time deal, the monitor is enjoying a 49% discount, slashing its price down from $1,200 to $617. This is an absolute steal considering what you’ll be getting in the process!

The monitor features a 34-inch curved display. It boasts a 175Hz refresh rate, support for AMD FreeSync Premium, a response time of 0.03ms, and offers DisplayHDR True Black 400 support. It’s a pretty fantastic gaming monitor, and at this price we doubt you’ll find anything better, so click here to go to Amazon and claim this deal today!
